title: 原來嘉士伯仲長情過謝拉特

replies.msg: 見佢FB都轉晒紅色慶祝利狗

【 可能係最實至名歸嘅英超冠軍 】
歷史時刻終於來臨！經過咗 30 年嘅等待，今日 #利記 終於再次拎到聯賽錦標，登上英超冠軍寶座！作為撐足利記 28 年嘅啤酒，我哋決定要搞大佢！十萬罐 #醇滑嘉士伯 準備緊㗎喇，嚟緊就請大家飲賀一賀佢！
詳情稍後公佈，密切留意！
#YNWA #利物浦限定罐準備中
[Probably the most deserved Premier League champions in the world]
The moment of history is finally here, after 30-year wait! Cheers to #LiverpoolFC for crowning as the #PremierLeague champions!
As #ProbrobablyTheRedsBiggestBeerSupporter for over 28 years, it is our pleasure to make this historic moment lasts. 100,000 cans of #CarlsbergSmoothDraught giveaway will be ready for grab! Stay tuned for more!
